data.comment: The match has started.
Alvaro Medran (Chicago) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Houston at SeatGeek Stadium.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Chicago's area.
Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Houston are caught offside.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Alvaro Medran gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chicago.
Christian Ramirez of Houston gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bridgeview.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Houston.
Houston are pushing forward but Darwin Quintero's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Chicago in the half of Houston.
Goal kick for Houston at SeatGeek Stadium.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Robert Beric.
In the minute 15, That's a fine assist from Jonathan Bornstein.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago.
In the minute 20, Marcos De Oliveira awards Houston a goal kick.
In Bridgeview a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal! Chicago extend their lead to 2-0 through Fabian Herbers.
Ignacio Aliseda with an assist there.
Free kick Chicago.
In the minute 26, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Chicago are coming forward and Francisco Calvo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Houston have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Houston.
Adam Lundqvist for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Chicago have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Houston's Memo Rodriguez has run offside.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Houston.
Maynor Figueroa (Houston) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bridgeview.
In the minute 38, Houston have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 39, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Chicago take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Alvaro Medran.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Houston.
In the minute 44, Marcos De Oliveira blows against Chicago's Ignacio Aliseda for offside.
Free kick Chicago.
At SeatGeek Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
Goal kick for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at SeatGeek Stadium.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Houston make their first substitution with Nico Lemoine replacing Memo Rodriguez.
The away team replace Matias Vera with Boniek Garcia.
The away team have replaced Niko Hansen with Ariel Lassiter. This is the second substitution made today by Tab Ramos.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Darwin Quintero of Houston is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Houston.
Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bridgeview.
Throw-in for Houston at SeatGeek Stadium.
In Bridgeview a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chicago drive upfield and Robert Beric gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Houston defender.
Free kick Houston.
In the minute 63, Elliot Collier is replacing Djordje Mihailovic for the home team.
In the minute 63, Mauricio Pineda is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Houston.
Mauro Manotas is on a sub for Darwin Quintero for Houston.
In the minute 65, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chicago's Robert Beric gets in a shot on goal at SeatGeek Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Chicago.
Chicago's Bobby Shuttleworth has been booked in Bridgeview.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 72, Chicago to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team replace Robert Beric with C.J. Sapong.
In the minute 74, Miguel Navarro is replacing Jonathan Bornstein for the home team.
Brandt Bronico is replacing Alvaro Medran for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 78, Chicago have a goal kick.
Tab Ramos is making the team's fifth substitution at SeatGeek Stadium with Tomas Martinez replacing Darwin Ceren.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Chicago throw-in in Houston's half.
In the minute 79, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Houston.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In Bridgeview Chicago attack through Elliot Collier. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Chicago push forward at SeatGeek Stadium and Francisco Calvo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Houston defence.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Ariel Lassiter (Houston) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 84, Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago are coming forward and Elliot Collier gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Penalty! Marcos De Oliveira points to the spot, great chance for Chicago...
In the minute 87, At SeatGeek Stadium, Marko Maric has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Chicago a penalty but C.J. Sapong misses from 12 yards.
Chicago have been awarded a penalty in Bridgeview...
In the minute 89, Kiki Struna (Houston) gets a yellow card.
Chicago are going well in Bridgeview. They now lead 4-0 thanks to a C.J. Sapong penalty.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
Mike Azira is on a sub for Fabian Herbers for Chicago.
